channel.title: RS client NOOBIFIER
channel.description:
A simple rs client noobifying program in C++, allows you to find & replace text in all the rs deob files fast.
[ul][li](exit) - closes the program[/li] [li](load) - load macros from file X[/li] [li](list) - list all macros[/li] [li](show) - show macro no X[/li] [li](find) - finds string X in file Y[/li] [li](macro) - run macro number X[/li] [li](replace) - replace search result X with Y[/li] [li](runbat) - create file run.bat[/li] [li](compbat) - creates file compile.bat[/li][/ul]
default.txt contains macro for making a deob connect random.txt contains random (:P) macros
[url=http://rapidshare.de/files/27440685/Noobifier.zip.html]http://rapidshare.de/files/27440685/Noobifier.zip.html[/url]

item.title: RS client NOOBIFIER

It doesn’t support regex at the moment.

It already is finished, I have no idea where some of you got the idea it isn’t finished

A simple rs client noobifying program in C++, allows you to find & replace text in all the rs deob files fast.

[ul]li - closes the program[/li]
li - load macros from file X[/li]
li - list all macros[/li]
li - show macro no X[/li]
li - finds string X in file Y[/li]
li - run macro number X[/li]

li - create file run.bat[/li]
li - creates file compile.bat[/li][/ul]

random.txt contains random (:P) macros
